refnamediv.refpurpose: The start-indent for the body text

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This start-indent property is added to the fo:flow for certain page sequences. Which page-sequences it is applied to is determined by the template named set.flow.properties. By default, that template adds it to the flow for page-sequences using the body master-reference, as well as appendixes and prefaces.
